description:
This module aims to highlight how luck has influenced and still
influences several aspects of the world we live in. From the
beginning of the universe, to our present-day lives, to the end
of the universe, random events beyond anyoneâ€™s control
continue to shape our fate. By exploring the various fields that
luck manifests itself in, the module ultimately delves into the
intriguingly precarious nature of existence.
title: Luck
